Admida presents Cruzo - A Minimal New Tab Google extension.

It's easy to give your Chrome New Tab window a new look with Cruzo. By installing this extension, you can replace your current New Tab window with a sleek interface.

By clicking "Add to Chrome," I accept the installation of the Cruzo extension and set Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing, as described in the Terms of Use(https://admida.com/terms-and-conditions.html) and Privacy Policy(https://admida.com/privacy-policy.html).

Here are some features of Cruzo:
Minimal Date and time display
Accurate clock & date and time
